description:
Look up information on any Halo Reach player using Halo Stats. 

Halo Stats for the Palm Pre has been updated and ported to the HP TouchPad!  All the same information as before but on a large screen with a new interface!

Information provided by this application: 
- Emblem 
- Service Tag 
- Armor Completion % 
- Last Game Type Played 
- Last Online Date / Time 
- Picture of your Spartan* 
- Rank 
- Daily Challenges Completed 
- Weekly Challenges Completed 
- Current Daily & Weekly Challenges 
- Commendation Information 
- Rank Images 
- K/D Ratios and Totals

*Bungie is not showing customizations on some of their images at this time.
